data.message:
Islam
Islam emerged in the seventh century in the Arabian Peninsula at the hands of the Prophet Mohammed , during a relatively short period spread around the world . (Through peace and through war ) . Today a number of Muslims in the Muslim world about Milird - from West Africa to Indonesia .

The emergence and spread of Islam is staggering: almost unknown people united by the power of faith in the new religion . During the short period dominated by large areas around the world , including our country , Syria , Iraq , Persia , Egypt , North Africa , Spain , France and other countries in Europe , as well as parts of India and China , by these conquests was born a new civilization Ahtndt large part of the heritage the ancient world , and evolved into a shiny civilization itself is the source of the spring of other civilizations , especially Western , where I left fingerprints in the field of religion and civilization and art.

Who is the Prophet Muhammad?
Prophet Muhammad is the prophet of Islam evangelist , a tribe of Quraish. Born in the city of Mecca in 570 AD , he became an orphan father and mother at a young age, Fterara in his uncle's house . When it became at the age of 40 descended upon revelation , carrying with him the word of God . At first he thought he is being subjected to an act of the devil , but soon he is convinced that God has chosen to be a missionary and a guide for humans . In about 613 began warning call from the torment of the Day of Judgment , but it was facing a disregard and abuse and rejection. In 622 the Prophet Muhammad migrated to the city of Yathrib , and since I knew the name of Yathrib, Medina. He was on his emigration from Mecca to Medina beginning of the new Islamic calendar known as the Islamic calendar .
